metadata.title: CVE-2017-15132 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in dovecot 2.0 up to 2.2.33 and 2.3.0. An abort of SASLauthentication results in a memory leak in dovecot's auth client used bylogin processes. The leak has impact in high performance configurationwhere same login processes are reused and can cause the process to crashdue to memory exhaustion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15132` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-core - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-lucene - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-solr - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dovecot package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.6').
